nodes.text: The Clone Wars: Season 7: Volume 1 is a graphic novel adaptation of episodes 1 through 6 of the seventh season of the television series Star Wars: The Clone Wars. The title was published by Random House as part of the Screen Comix series on December 8, 2020.
Star Wars: The Clone Wars Screen Comix is a graphic novel-style retelling with full-color images and dialogue from the show!

The first six episodes of Star Wars: The Clone Wars' revival seventh season are retold in the new Screen Comix format. Follow classic characters like Ahsoka Tano, Obi-Wan Kenobi, Anakin Skywalker, and Yoda--voiced by the series' original cast--in the epic story of the deadly Clone Wars in the new season on Disney+. The Star Wars: The Clone Wars Screen Comix is a 320-paged graphic novel-style retelling of the show, featuring final frames and dialogue from the series in vibrant full color, will delight fans of all ages.
